title: Main Account Hijacked!
body:
My main account is currently under hijack by an unknown person, I've applied for an account recovery but do not remember the email used as it was over 3 years ago. This looks to have been taken over for 2-3 days now while I've been working and the person has changed my account and removed all my IRL friends, RIOT if you could please help me and LOCK my account until the recovery is sorted i can provide everything to prove that this is my account.
I've come to help and support in hopes a staff member can see this!

Summoner Name: The GoochTickler

replies.body:
Thanks for the reply! 
will be making sure the security is up to date from now on, like i said the account is quite old and just never really thought this kind of thing would happen! thanks for the support :D

Hey there,

Sorry to hear your account was compromised, the only thing you're able to do at this point is to submit a support ticket and begin the account recovery process, which it sounds like you've done.

When an account is under investigation it will be locked by Player Support.

While you wait for Player Support to help out I recommend running through [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) KB article regarding account security.


Apologies for any mistakes in this post, writing this from my mobile.
